casebody.data:
Frank Germeten, Respondent, v. Clarence M. Roof, Appellant. Decided May 2, 1887. Appeal from judgment entered upon the verdict of a jury. George Bell, for appellant. Emil S. Arnold, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and O’Gorman, JJ.

Opinion Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
